data.title: FeedMe
data.desc: Have you ever got stuck on what to cook for today? The feedMe application helps you decide what to cook and drink by random item in the category. The application also gives you instructions on how to cook the dishes and your new favorite cocktails.

data.title: MamaGreen
data.desc: MamaGreen is your choice. The perfect application can search for the plant and show how to take care of them. You can ensure that the plant's name you look up is correct by seeing the picture with the result below the search bar!

data.title: RiceMenu
data.desc: Menu from Rice restaurant in 14th DC.

data.title: SaveIt
data.desc: It is an application that can create a personal account that is able to create a folder and save files such as pictures and store it in firebase.

data.title: NewsApp
data.desc: Updated everyday tech news that is able to search what you have just heard.

data.title: MovieSeat
data.desc: The web application that lets the users select the seats from the movie theatre.

data.title: PhotoSell
data.desc: Selling pictures application which most of the pictures categorize based on the season, including spring, summer, fall, and winter vibes.
